creator: kovacsden@gmail.com
text:
Hi,

I changed module (prefork -> event) in (centos 7.x) 00-mpm.conf file and restart httpd and a few hours later chrash all major browser said bad ssl protocol.

best regards,
Denes
You'll need to elaborate if you think there's a bug in the server.
creator: covener@gmail.com

text: Due to the lack of information over the past months I am inclined to close this bug as invalid. Please re-open if necessary.
creator: toscano.luca@gmail.com
